trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Monument
There were no other sightings in Monument on or around December 16th 2003
divs: Sighting DetailsSharon Allen was taking son- Alva to a band concert. She saw a disk, shedescirbed as like in Independence Day hovering with a slight wobble to it. Ithad three white lights pointing down. A rotating blue light. This may show upin the photo. The son was orginally frighten, but then became interested. She described conditions as dusk, but a 600 p.m. in Dec. its dark. Theyphotographed and watched for about 4 min.-- by Ed Burke
